docs.title: aiovkcom
docs.text: async python vk.com API wrapper for REST API methods, see documentation.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
To use vk.com API you need an access_token.

import aiovkcom
async with aiovkcom.API(v='5.241', access_token='your access token') as vk:
contacts = await vk.account.getContactList()
friends = await api.friends.get()
events = await api.wall.get()

docs.title: License
docs.text: aiovkcom is released under the BSD 2-Clause License.

docs.title: REST API
docs.text: List of all methods is available here: https://vk.com/dev/methods.

docs.title: Executing requests
docs.text:
import aiovkcom
async with aiovkcom.API(v='5.241', access_token='abcde') as vk:
news = await vk.newsfeed.get()

is equivalent to GET request:

GET https://api.vk.com/method/newsfeed.get?access_token=abcde&v=5.241

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
$ pip install aiovkcom

or

$ git clone https://github.com/konstantintogoi/aiovkcom.git
$ cd aiovkcom
$ python setup.py install

docs.title: Request Format
docs.text:
httpx.AsyncClient makes GET requests according to Request Format. For example:

GET https://api.vk.com/method/newsfeed.get?access_token=abcde&v=5.241
